data.comment: The match has started at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
Charleroi take a 1-0 lead thanks to Kaveh Rezaei.
In the minute 29, Ryota Morioka instrumental with a fine assist.
The first-half is over at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
The second-half is underway at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
In the minute 54, Ryan Sanusi (Beerschot) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's now 2-0 in Charleroi as Ali Gholizadeh scores for Charleroi.
That's a fine assist from Shamar Nicholson.
In the minute 62, Gaetan Hendrickx (Charleroi) has replaced the possibly injured Ryota Morioka at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
Beerschot make their first substitution with Tarik Tissoudali replacing Pierre Bourdin.
The away team have replaced Tom Pietermaat with Abdoulie Sanyang. This is the second substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
In the minute 63, Dario Van Den Buijs is replacing Yan Vorogovskiy for Beerschot at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
An attacking Charleroi player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Charleroi are going well in Charleroi. They now lead 3-0 thanks to a Kaveh Rezaei penalty.
In the minute 88, Ivan Goranov is on a sub for Kayembe for Charleroi.
Ken Nkuba is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for the home team.
Kevin Van Damme blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
Musashi Suzuki keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-1.
